Name: 游戏策划面试模拟器
About the game: This is a simple 'real' interview simulation game. As a fresh out of college student, in this cold winter employment season, try hard to harvest offers ~ game Length: 5 - 120 Minutes As long as you don't get on top of it, it's completely in time for a refund note: It's only a text adventure game, but it's challenging. Thank you for playing my game and I hope to get the answers we want~
